artist: Decorator: Mary Chase Perry; Maker: Pewabic Pottery
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Marion Nelson
description: heavy vase with bulbous body narrowing at neck and slightly flaring mouth; green glaze; 7 large applied leaves at bottom with 7 stalks with flowers at top between leaves
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees
markings: \'PEWABIC\', stamped into clay, on bottom; \'701\' and \'MCP\', incised in clay, on bottom; \'518\', in red pigment, on bottom
medium: Carved and matte green glaze earthenware
title: Vase
